message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.CY 

The paper proposes a novel approach for thwarting relay attacks in transparent authentication schemes, which is a security problem. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also presents a system that uses low-cost sensors commonly available on personal devices, which suggests that it may fall under the categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.SY (Systems and Control). Additionally, the paper discusses the ease-of-use of the proposed system, which could place it under cs.SE (Software Engineering) or cs.CY (Computers and Society).
